name: The Wretched
resistance: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing while in dim light or darkness

traits.name: Wretched Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The Wretched has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the Wretched's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated. The Wretched otherwise has disadvantage on attack rolls.
